content: learn how to crochet a log cabin granny square blanket with just a 4 row repeat this blanket builds very quickly - perfect for stash busting if you can crochet a granny square or have crocheted a mitered granny square before this blanket will be a breeze for you hook size s according to your yarn for my blanket i used 4mm crochet hook and i used 3 x balls of cream yarn hayfield bonus and 1 ball of the following colours hayfield bonus neon scheepjes colour crafter hengelo scheepjes colour crafter tilburg scheepjes colour crafter knokke scheepjes colour crafter malmédy scheepjes colour crafter eindhoven & scheepjes colour crafter leeuwarden my colour order for my row i used cream in-between 2 blocks of colours for example - cream purple pink cream pinky red blue cream green yellow cream orange purple cream etc size is approximately 39 inches 99cm square i made 27 blocks of colour 4 row per colour block for a total of 108 row you are free to use any yarn any hook size and any colour combinations you fancy
